typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		stringa as string,
		intero as short,
		formula as string,
		float as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'importazione',
	fileName: 'provaExcel.xlsx',
	sheetName: 'Sheet1',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		campoStringa as string,
		campoIntero as short,
		campoFormula as string,
		campoNumericoconFormula as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		campoStringa = stringa,
		campoIntero = intero,
		campoFormula = formula,
		campoNumericoconFormula = float
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
